files.content:
# Next.js MVP Template

This is a minimal Next.js + Tailwind starter used by the AI automation to scaffold MVPs dynamically.

## Features
- Next.js 14
- Tailwind CSS
- Example API route (`/api/hello`)
- Clean layout ready for AI code injection

---

### How to use manually

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

Then visit [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)
